query: What amounts of pre-accession funds have been allocated by the Union, and to which specific projects, for the reform of the judicial system in Macedonia since it acquired the status of a candidate country? How much of the funds allocated have already been paid out to the beneficiaries? What were the exact amounts co-financed by domestic authorities? For each of these questions, please provide statistical data for each project on a yearly basis, separately for each of the years 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009 and 2010.
